title: Aligned Timestamp - LGBM by meter type
description: This notebook is an implementation of @Fred Navruzov's Timestamp Alignment method to @corochann's kernel. The idea is to align the timestamp by peak air temperature, based on an assumption that the highest air temperature should appear at around 14:00. After aligning the timestamp of weather data, LB jumped from 1.12 to 1.11. Credits go to:  https://www.kaggle.com/corochann/ashrae-training-lgbm-by-meter-type https://www.kaggle.com/frednavruzov/aligning-temperature-timestamp Thanks @S D a lot for sharing his insights: https://www.kaggle.com/c/ashrae-energy-prediction/discussion/114483#latest-660023
